name: The Paper Doll Chronicles
description:
This is a demo of Faravid Interactive's current project The Paper Doll Chronicles. 

The Paper Doll Chronicles is a narratively driven interactive drama with RPG elements, and a touch of absurdity. 

You play Margo, an ordinary girl who's just found a way to cope with existence, and who now sets out to sort out some unfinished business, as well as find herself.  

The design choices behind this game are based on things we want to avoid, namely;

  • Pixel hunts. The game is sidescrolling with keyboard controls. Interactibles will be very hard to miss.
  • Combining everything with everything to brute force a progress. The inventory system will guide the player so that only relevant interactions are available. There's no room for tedious use-this-on-that routines.
  • Speaking to everyone about everything. Characters will only say relevant things, and there will be no long lists of topic to deplete. 

If you like the demo, show us some love and write something nice in the comments, or even make a donation.
